events.title: Western tanks pledged to Ukraine
events.description: US, Germany, and UK announce delivery of main battle tanks (Abrams, Leopard, Challenger) to Ukraine

events.title: One year of Russia-Ukraine war
events.description: First anniversary of Russian invasion marked by international pledges of continued support for Ukraine

events.title: ICC issues arrest warrant for Putin
events.description: International Criminal Court issues arrest warrant for Vladimir Putin for alleged war crimes in Ukraine

events.title: Bakhmut falls to Russian forces
events.description: Russian forces capture Bakhmut after months of intense fighting, Wagner Group claims victory

events.title: Kakhovka Dam destruction
events.description: Kakhovka Dam in southern Ukraine destroyed, causing massive flooding and humanitarian crisis

events.title: Wagner mutiny
events.description: Wagner Group chief Prigozhin launches armed rebellion against Russian military leadership, briefly advancing toward Moscow

events.title: Finland joins NATO
events.description: Finland officially becomes 31st member of NATO alliance, doubling NATO's border with Russia

events.title: Prigozhin killed in plane crash
events.description: Wagner Group leader Yevgeny Prigozhin dies in suspicious plane crash northwest of Moscow

events.title: Ukraine strikes Sevastopol naval base
events.description: Ukrainian missile strike damages Russian Black Sea Fleet headquarters in occupied Crimea

events.title: Hamas attacks Israel
events.description: Hamas launches surprise attack on Israel from Gaza, killing over 1,200 people in deadliest day in Israeli history

events.title: Israel declares war on Hamas
events.description: Israel formally declares war on Hamas and begins military operations in Gaza Strip

events.title: Israel ground invasion of Gaza
events.description: Israeli forces launch major ground offensive into Gaza Strip with large-scale military operations

events.title: Israel-Hamas temporary ceasefire
events.description: First temporary ceasefire begins with hostage and prisoner exchanges

events.title: Russian missile strikes across Ukraine
events.description: Russia launches massive coordinated missile and drone attacks on Ukrainian cities during holiday period

events.title: EU imposes 12th sanctions package on Russia
events.description: European Union implements comprehensive new sanctions targeting Russian economy and military industry

events.title: Houthi attacks in Red Sea escalate
events.description: Yemen-based Houthis intensify attacks on commercial shipping in Red Sea, disrupting global trade

events.title: Navalny dies in Russian prison
events.description: Russian opposition leader Alexei Navalny dies in Arctic penal colony under suspicious circumstances

events.title: Two years of Russia-Ukraine war
events.description: Second anniversary of Russian invasion as conflict continues with no clear resolution

events.title: Sweden joins NATO
events.description: Sweden becomes 32nd member of NATO, completing Nordic expansion of the alliance

events.title: Putin wins Russian election
events.description: Vladimir Putin secures fifth presidential term with 87% of vote in internationally disputed election

events.title: Moscow concert hall attack
events.description: Terrorist attack on Crocus City Hall near Moscow kills over 140 people in deadliest attack in Russia in decades

events.title: Iran strikes Israel directly
events.description: Iran launches over 300 missiles and drones at Israel in first direct attack, mostly intercepted

events.title: US approves $61B Ukraine aid package
events.description: United States Congress approves major military and economic aid package for Ukraine after months of delay

events.title: Russia opens new front in Kharkiv
events.description: Russian forces launch major offensive in northeastern Kharkiv region opening new front line

events.title: Iran President dies in helicopter crash
events.description: Iranian President Ebrahim Raisi killed in helicopter crash in northern Iran

events.title: G7 approves $50B Ukraine loan
events.description: G7 nations agree to provide $50 billion loan to Ukraine backed by frozen Russian assets

events.title: NATO summit pledges Ukraine support
events.description: NATO leaders pledge irreversible path to Ukraine membership at 75th anniversary summit in Washington

events.title: Hamas leader Haniyeh assassinated
events.description: Hamas political leader Ismail Haniyeh killed in Tehran, Iran blames Israel

events.title: Ukraine invades Kursk region
events.description: Ukrainian forces launch surprise cross-border offensive into Russia's Kursk Oblast, first invasion of Russia since WWII

events.title: Lebanon pager attacks
events.description: Mass coordinated explosions of Hezbollah communications devices across Lebanon kills dozens

events.title: Hezbollah leader Nasrallah killed
events.description: Israeli airstrike in Beirut kills Hezbollah Secretary-General Hassan Nasrallah

events.title: Iran ballistic missile strike on Israel
events.description: Iran launches approximately 180 ballistic missiles at Israel in large-scale retaliation

events.title: Sinwar killed in Gaza
events.description: Hamas leader Yahya Sinwar killed by Israeli forces in Gaza, major blow to Hamas leadership

events.title: Israel strikes Iran
events.description: Israel conducts airstrikes on Iranian military targets in response to ballistic missile attacks
